c74object.name: bandedWG~
c74object.description: The bandedWG~ object uses waveguide techniques to model a variety of sounds, including bowed bars, glasses, and bowls. For more information, see Essl, G. and Cook, P. "Banded Waveguides: Towards Physical Modelling of Bar Percussion Instruments", Proceedings of the 1999 International Computer Music Conference.

metadatalist.metadata: Dan Trueman and R. Luke DuBois

method.name: control
method.description:
Control messages must have two arguments, control number and control value (0-128).
Control numbers:
1 = gain
2 = bow pressure
4 = bow motion
11 = vibrato frequency
16 = instrument type (0 = uniform bar, 1 = tuned bar, 2 = glass harmonica, 3 = tibetan bowl)
64 = set striking
128 = bow velocity

method.name: noteon
method.description: The message noteon followed by a pitch (Hz) and amplitude (0-1) will play a note.
